body: Versioning-3, an experimental API, introduces new `versioning_info` metadata that needs to be exposed in WorkflowExecutionInfo. See  https://github.com/temporalio/api/pull/472 for details.

comments.body: The go sdk just exposes raw protobufs for `WorkflowExecutionInfo`, and the CLI just uses them directly. Closing...

title: Add versioning fields to WorkflowExecutionInfo
